thread.title: A flowchart to help Ben Carson decide what to talk about
thread.title_full: A flowchart to help Ben Carson decide what to talk about - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: A flowchart to help Ben Carson decide what to talk about
text: Just when you think Ben Carson couldn't offend anyone else, he brings up the Holocaust. The GOP presidential hopeful has sparked more than his fair share of controversies in recent weeks, from comments ranging from the mass shooting in Oregon to having a Muslim president to an analogy between prison rape and homosexuality. See also: Larry Wilmore for president: Keeping it 100 on 2016 To help Carson contain his word vomit, we've created a helpful flowchart. (You're welcome, aides.) Image: Mashable Illustration Max Knoblauch And yes, these are all really things a neurosurgeon said. Have something to add to this story? Share it in the comments.
